ItemTemplate.Description: XML template for an empty Android fragment

ItemTemplate.Description: Fragment based on the Android support libraries for backwards compatibility

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross Core
ProjectTemplate.Description: A project template for a the shared class library for use by an MvvmCross Android or iOS application.

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross Android App
ProjectTemplate.Description: A project template for a MvvmCross Android application. This template is dependent on the 'MvvmCross Core' project template being in the same solution.

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross App
ProjectTemplate.Description: A multi-project template for a MvvmCross application for iOS and Android.

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross iOS App
ProjectTemplate.Description: A project template for a MvvmCross iOS application. This template is dependent on the 'MvvmCross Core' project template being in the same solution.
